text: Elly Bulkin (born 1944) is an American writer. A founding editor of Conditions, she has edited several collections of lesbian writing. ==Works== * (ed. with Joan Larkin) Amazon Poetry: An anthology of Lesbian Poetry, 1975 * (ed.) Lesbian Fiction: An Anthology, 1981 * (ed. with Joan Larkin) Lesbian Poetry: An Anthology, 1981 * (ed. with Minnie Bruce Pratt and Barbara Smith) Yours in Struggle, 1984 ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American writers Category:Lesbian writers Category:Jewish American writers Category:American women writers
title: Elly Bulkin
